Overview[]:
Terry seems to be an affable and humorous individual. He was very close with 
Michonne
 and 
Mike
, the latter whom was his best friend. However, one day when Terry and Mike got high, walkers attacked their camp and killed Michonne's 
son
 and themselves. As punishment, Michonne kept Terry and Mike as walkers.
Pre-Apocalypse[]:
Little is known about Terry's life prior to or as the outbreak began, except that he was good friends with 
Mike
 and Michonne. He does appear to have had an interest in art, and as evidenced by a conversation during a dream, his tastes differed from that of Michonne's.
Death[]:
Killed By
Himself 
(Caused)


Zombies
When walkers attack the camp he is staying at, Terry is unable to fight off due to being high on drugs and is devoured. Later, he succumbs to the infection and reanimates.
Andrea Harrison
 
(Zombified)
Terry's zombified head was presumably put down by Andrea following the Governor's fight with Michonne, as it is never seen again afterwards.
